mapper.select: select m.member_id, member_identification, member_file_system_name, a.apply_id, apply_course, apply_location, apply_date, apply_register_date, starter_member_id, review_id, review_register_date, review_update_date, review_title, review_contents, review_file_system_name from tbl_member m join tbl_apply a on m.member_id = a.starter_member_id join tbl_review r on r.member_id = a.starter_member_id order by apply_register_date desc
